title: Lynda - Street Photography The City at Night
description:
Lynda - Street Photography The City at Night

This Course will be good to the Best for DL within 30 days after has been post, after that it might not be good DL already, please do me favour to continue seeding to keep this torrent alive.

1h 24m Intermediate Aug 21, 2015 | Uploaded in Dec 8, 2015 by 2boweb

Subject: Photography 
Author: Steve Simon 
 
Cities take on entirely new personalities at nightâ€”and capturing personality is what street photography is all about. In this installment of the Street Photography series, photographer, author, and educator Steve Simon takes to the streets, beaches, and outer boroughs of New York after dark. Steve explores not only the creative options behind nighttime street shooting, but also the technical considerations and camera settings that provide the most fluid, effortless shooting situations.
Topics include:
	â€¢	Taking shots of the skyline at night
	â€¢	Shooting with a long exposure and noise reduction
	â€¢	Shooting subjects in low light
	â€¢	Panning with a moving subject
	â€¢	Shooting light trails
	â€¢	Zeroing out camera settings after a complex shot
